languages.text: Охотник за головами может видеть {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг противника{/g} (от I до VII). Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} охотника за головами, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Законная добыча{/g}, имеет 3 заряда и позволяет за один заряд наложить на врага {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}. Когда охотник за головами убивает добычу, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} до конца боя в зависимости от ее ранга: I–II: +25% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} охотника за головами в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. III–IV: +(5 × ранг добычи)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} и +(2 × ранг добычи)% шанса критического попадания. V–VII: оба предыдущих бонуса. Эти бонусы суммируются. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} охотника за головами позволяет ему мгновенно атаковать все цели с эффектом "добыча" в {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g}. Эти атаки всегда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадают{/g} и всегда являются критическими. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} охотника за головами: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} охотника за головами: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знания: Ксеносы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}.
languages.original_text: Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}, has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Охотник за головами может видеть {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг противника{/g} (от I до VII). Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} охотника за головами, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Законная добыча{/g}, имеет 3 заряда и позволяет за один заряд наложить на врага {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}. III–IV: +(5 × ранг добычи)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} и +(2 × ранг добычи)% шанса критического попадания. V–VII: оба предыдущих бонуса. Эти бонусы суммируются. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} охотника за головами позволяет ему мгновенно атаковать все цели с эффектом "добыча" в {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g}. Эти атаки всегда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадают{/g} и всегда являются критическими. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} охотника за головами: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} охотника за головами: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знания: Ксеносы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}.

languages.text: Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}, has 3 charges. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.
languages.original_text: Охотник за головами может видеть {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг противника{/g} (от I до VII). Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} охотника за головами, {g|f:b97c9e76f6ca46d3bb8ccd86baa9d7c9}Законная добыча{/g}, имеет 3 заряда и позволяет за один заряд наложить на врага эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}. Когда охотник за головами убивает добычу, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} до конца боя в зависимости от ее ранга: I–II: +25% от максимального здоровья охотника за головами в качестве временного здоровья. III–IV: +(5 × ранг добычи)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} и +(2 × ранг добычи)% шанса критического попадания. V–VII: оба предыдущих бонуса. Эти бонусы суммируются. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} охотника за головами позволяет ему мгновенно атаковать все цели с эффектом "добыча" в {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g}. Эти атаки всегда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадают{/g} и всегда являются критическими. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} охотника за головами: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} охотника за головами: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знания: Ксеносы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hunters are able to see the difficulty tier of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Hunter's keystone ability Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the prey effect on an enemy. If a Hunter kills their prey, they gain bonuses that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers from I to II: temporary wounds equal to 25% of the Hunter's maximum wounds. Tiers from III to IV: +(10 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical damage and + (2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers from V to VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Hunter's heroic act allows them to attack all their prey within their line of sight at once. These attacks always hit and always score critical hits. Key characteristics: Ballistic Skill, Perception, Agility. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Lore (Xenos), Athletics, Demolition.

Hunters are able to see the difficulty tier of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Hunter's keystone ability Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the prey effect on an enemy. If a Hunter kills their prey, they gain bonuses that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers from I to II: temporary wounds equal to 25% of the Hunter's maximum wounds. Tiers from III to IV: +(10 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical damage and + (2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers from V to VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Hunter's heroic act allows them to attack all their prey within their line of sight at once. These attacks always hit and always score critical hits. Key characteristics: Ballistic Skill, Perception, Agility. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Lore (Xenos), Athletics, Demolition.

Hunters are able to see the difficulty tier of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Hunter's keystone ability Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the prey effect on an enemy. If a Hunter kills their prey, they gain bonuses that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I — II: temporary wounds equal to 25% of the Hunter's maximum wounds. Tiers III — IV: +(10 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical damage and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V — VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Hunter's heroic act allows them to attack all of the Hunter's prey within their line of sight at once. These attacks always hit and always score critical hits. Key characteristics: Ballistic Skill, Perception, Agility. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Lore (Xenos), Athletics, Demolition.

If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always hit and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Hunt Down the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g} has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the prey {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always hit and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

languages.text: Kopfgeldjägern ist es möglich, die {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} ihrer Feinde zu sehen, die von I bis VII variieren kann. Die wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Jagd auf die Beute machen{/g}, hat 3 Ladungen. Durch Verwenden einer Ladung kann er den {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} auf einen Feind anwenden. Tötet ein Kopfgeldjäger seine Beute, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}, die bis zum Ende des Kampfes andauern und abhängig von der Schwierigkeitsstufe des Feindes sind: Grade I-II: temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Wunden{/g} entsprechend 25 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers. Grade III-IV: +(5 × Schwierigkeitsstufe der Beute) % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} und +(2 × Schwierigkeitsstufe der Beute) % kritische Trefferchance. Grade V-VII:alle oben genannten Boni. Diese Boni addieren sich. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers erlaubt ihm, seine gesamte Beute innerhalb seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} gleichzeitig anzugreifen. Diese Angriffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} immer und erzielen stets kritische Treffer. Wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}.
languages.original_text: Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}, has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

Grade V — VII:alle oben genannten Boni. Diese Boni addieren sich. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers erlaubt ihm, all seine Beute innerhalb seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} gleichzeitig anzugreifen. Diese Angriffe treffen immer und erzielen stets kritische Treffer. Wesentliche{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic} Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Bewusstheit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}.

Kopfgeldjägern ist es möglich, die {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} ihrer Feinde zu sehen, die von I bis VII variieren kann. Die wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers, Jagd auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} machen, hat 3 Ladungen. Durch Verwenden einer Ladung kann er den Beute-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} auf einen Feind anwenden. Tötet ein Kopfgeldjäger seine Beute, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}, die bis zum Ende des Kampfes andauern und abhängig von der Schwierigkeitsstufe des Feindes sind: Grade I-II: temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Wunden{/g} entsprechend 25 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers. Grade III-IV: +(5 × Schwierigkeitsstufe der Beute) % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} und +(2 × Schwierigkeitsstufe der Beute) % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. Grade V-VII:alle oben genannten Boni. Diese Boni addieren sich. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers erlaubt ihm, seine gesamte Beute innerhalb seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} gleichzeitig anzugreifen. Diese Angriffe treffen immer und erzielen stets kritische Treffer. Wesentliche{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic} Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Bewusstheit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}.

languages.text: Les chasseurs de primes sont capables d'identifier le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de leurs ennemis, qui peut varier de I à VII. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du chasseur de primes, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Traque de la proie{/g}, dispose de 3 charges. En utilisant une charge, il peut infliger l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g} à un ennemi. Si un chasseur de primes élimine sa proie, il bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui durent jusqu'à la fin du combat et dépendent du niveau de difficulté de l'ennemi : Niveaux I à II : {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} correspondant à 25 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} du chasseur de primes. Niveaux III à IV : +(5 × niveau de difficulté de la proie) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et +(2 × niveau de difficulté de la proie) % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique. Niveaux V à VII : tous les bonus ci-dessus. Ces bonus sont cumulables. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du chasseur de primes lui permet d'attaquer simultanément toutes les proies situées dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Ces attaques touchent toujours leur cible et portent systématiquement des coups critiques. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}.
languages.original_text: Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}, has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les chasseurs de primes sont capables d'identifier le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de leurs ennemis, qui peut varier de I à VII. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du chasseur de primes, {g|f:b97c9e76f6ca46d3bb8ccd86baa9d7c9}Traque de la proie{/g}, dispose de 3 charges. En utilisant une charge, il peut infliger l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g} à un ennemi. Si un chasseur de primes élimine sa proie, il bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui durent jusqu'à la fin du combat et dépendent du niveau de difficulté de l'ennemi : Niveaux I à II : {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} correspondant à 25 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} du chasseur de primes. Niveaux III à IV : +(5 × niveau de difficulté de la proie) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et +(2 × niveau de difficulté de la proie) % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique. Niveaux V à VII : tous les bonus ci-dessus. Ces bonus sont cumulables. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du chasseur de primes lui permet d'attaquer simultanément toutes les proies situées dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Ces attaques touchent toujours leur cible et portent systématiquement des coups critiques. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}.

languages.text: 赏金猎人可以看到敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}，从I级到VII级不等。 赏金猎人的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}击杀猎物{/g}，拥有3次使用次数。赏金猎人可以使用此能力，为目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}“猎物”{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。 当赏金猎人杀死猎物时，会获得{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。加成效果取决于猎物的难度等级： I级 — II级：赏金猎人获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的25%。 III级 — IV级：赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高（5×猎物难度等级）%，暴击率提高（2×猎物难度等级）%，效果持续至战斗结束。 V级 — VII级：上述效果均生效。 上述加成效果可叠加。 赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}能力可以同时攻击{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内的所有猎物。 所有攻击都必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中目标{/g}，而且必定造成暴击伤害。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}知识（异形）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}。

The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}, has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 赏金猎人可以看到敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}，从I级到VII级不等。 赏金猎人的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：击杀{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}，拥有3次使用次数。赏金猎人可以使用此能力，为目标施加“猎物”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。 当赏金猎人杀死猎物时，会获得{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。加成效果取决于猎物的难度等级： I级 — II级：赏金猎人获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的25%。 III级 — IV级：赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高（5×猎物难度等级）%，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高（2×猎物难度等级）%，效果持续至战斗结束。 V级 — VII级：上述效果均生效。 上述加成效果可叠加。 赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}能力可以同时攻击{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内的所有猎物。 所有攻击都必定命中目标，而且必定造成暴击伤害。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}知识（异形）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}。

languages.text: Los cazarrecompensas pueden ver el {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de sus enemigos. Este valor oscila entre I y VII. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los cazarrecompensas, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Cazar a la presa{/g}, tiene 3 cargas. Al gastar una carga, pueden causar el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Presa{/g} a un enemigo. Si un cazarrecompensas mata a su presa, obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} que conservará hasta el final el combate según el nivel de desafío del enemigo: Niveles I — II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Heridas temporales{/g} equivalentes al 25 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cazarrecompensas. Niveles III — IV: +(5 × nivel de desafío de la presa) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} y +(2 × nivel de desafío de la presa) % de probabilidad de impacto crítico. Niveles V — VII: Todas las bonificaciones anteriores. Estas bonificaciones se acumulan. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los cazarrecompensas les permite atacar a todas las presas ubicadas en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} al mismo tiempo. Los ataques {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} siempre y siempre infligen impactos críticos. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}.
languages.original_text: Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}, has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

Al gastar una carga, pueden causar el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Presa{/g} a un enemigo. Si un cazarrecompensas mata a su presa, obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} que conservará hasta el final el combate según el nivel de desafío del enemigo: Niveles I — II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Heridas temporales{/g} equivalentes al 25 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cazarrecompensas. Niveles III — IV: +(5 × nivel de desafío de la presa) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} y +(2 × nivel de desafío de la presa) % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico. Niveles V — VII: Todas las bonificaciones anteriores. Estas bonificaciones se acumulan. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los cazarrecompensas les permite atacar a todas las presas ubicadas en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} al mismo tiempo. Los ataques impactan siempre y siempre infligen impactos críticos. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}.

languages.original_text: The hunter can see the enemy's rank (1 to 7). The hunter's key ability, Legitimate Prey, has 3 charges and allows you to put a prey status on an enemy for one charge. When the hunter kills prey, he gains bonuses until the end of combat depending on the enemy's difficulty class: 1-2: +25% of the hunter's maximum number of health points as temporary health points. 3-4: +(10 × difficulty class)% critical damage and + (2 × difficulty class)% critical hit chance. 5-7: both previous bonuses. These bonuses add up. The hunter's Heroic Act allows him to instantly attack all targets with Prey status in his field of vision. These attacks always hit and are always critical. Important Hunter Traits: Ranged Combat, Perception, Dexterity. Hunter Skills: Observation, Medicine, Knowledge: Xenos, Athletics, Explosive Engineering.

languages.text: バウンティハンターはIからVIIで示される敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度ティア{/g}を見ることができる。 バウンティハンターの要となる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:b97c9e76f6ca46d3bb8ccd86baa9d7c9}獲物狩り{/g}であり、3チャージ所持している。チャージを消費することで敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}をもたらす バウンティハンターが獲物を倒すと、バウンティハンターは敵の脅威度ティアに応じた{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得し、これは戦闘終了時まで持続する。 ティアI-II：バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の25%と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}。 ティアIII-IV：戦闘終了まで+（5 × 獲物の脅威度）%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}と+（2 × 獲物の脅威度）%クリティカル命中率が付与される。 ティアV-VII：先に説明したボーナスの全て。 これらボーナスは累積する。 バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}ではバウンティハンターは一度に{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}上の全ての獲物を攻撃することが可能。 この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し、クリティカルヒットになる。 主な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}デモリション{/g}。
languages.original_text: Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:b97c9e76f6ca46d3bb8ccd86baa9d7c9}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}, has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: バウンティハンターはIからVIIで示される敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度ティア{/g}を見ることができる。 バウンティハンターの要となる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は獲物{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}狩り{/g}であり、3チャージ所持している。チャージを消費することで敵に獲物{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}をもたらす バウンティハンターが獲物を倒すと、バウンティハンターは敵の脅威度ティアに応じた{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得し、これは戦闘終了時まで持続する。 ティアI-II：バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の25%と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}。 ティアIII-IV：戦闘終了まで+（5 × 獲物の脅威度）%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}と+（2 × 獲物の脅威度）%クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}が付与される。 ティアV-VII：先に説明したボーナスの全て。 これらボーナスは累積する。 バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}ではバウンティハンターは一度に{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}上の全ての獲物を攻撃することが可能。 この攻撃は必ず命中し、クリティカルヒットになる。 主な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}デモリション{/g}。

languages.text: Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:b97c9e76f6ca46d3bb8ccd86baa9d7c9}Hunt Down the Prey{/g} has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always hit and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bounty Hunters are able to see the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of their enemies, which can vary from I to VII. The Bounty Hunter's keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:b97c9e76f6ca46d3bb8ccd86baa9d7c9}Hunt Down the Prey{/g} has 3 charges. By spending a charge, they can inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on an enemy. If a Bounty Hunter kills their prey, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that last until the end of combat and depend on the enemy's difficulty tier: Tiers I–II: {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once. These attacks always hit and always score critical hits. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

languages.text: Ödül Avcısı, düşmanlarının I ila VII arasında değişebilen {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesini{/g} görebilir. Ödül Avcısı'nın kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} olan {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Av Peşinde{/g}'nin 3 kullanım hakkı bulunur. Bir kullanım hakkı harcayarak bir düşman üzerinde {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}av{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkisi{/g} yaratabilir. Ödül Avcısı, avını öldürürse etkisi çatışma sonuna dek devam eden ve düşmanın zorluk derecesine göre değişen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} elde eder: I–II. Derece: Ödül Avcısı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %25'ine eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g}. III–IV. Derece: +%(5 × avın zorluk derecesi) kadar {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} ve +%(2 × avın zorluk derecesi) kadar kritik vuruş olasılığı. V–VII. Derece: Yukarıdaki bonusların tamamı. Bu bonuslar üst üste birikebilir. Ödül Avcısı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan tüm avlarına aynı anda saldırabilmesine olanak tanır. Bu saldırılar yüzde yüz isabet ederek kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşa{/g} dönüşür. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Kültür (Zeno){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletizm{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Tahribat{/g}.

Tiers III–IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance. Tiers V–VII: all of the aforementioned bonuses. These bonuses stack. The Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack all of the Bounty Hunter's prey within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at once.
